hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The likeness of the one who takes back his gift, is that of a dog which goes back to its vomit and eats it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ لِخَبَرِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَبَّاسٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From 'Abdullah Bin 'Abbas About It
